trans-unit.source: Provides data for callbacks that are invoked when a XAML object writer sets a value using a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XAML 物件寫入器設定值，使用標記延伸時叫用的回呼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Although a class might indicate with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> that it handles all attempts to set a value through a markup extension, it might also use more than one markup extension to do so.
trans-unit.target: 雖然類別可能會與<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>它所處理的所有嘗試設定值，以透過標記延伸，它可能也會使用超過一個標記延伸，進行存取。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Thus each set operation ultimately resolves to a separate markup extension implementation in the supporting code.
trans-unit.target: 因此每個設定作業最終會解析為不同的標記延伸實作中支援的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs class reports the specifics of each attempted markup extension set operation so that the callback can branch accordingly for different <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>cases.
trans-unit.target: XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs 類別會報告每個嘗試的標記延伸模組設定作業的細節，使回呼可以相應地進行分支的不同<xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>案例。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: XAML type system / schema information for the member being set.
trans-unit.target: XAML 類型系統所設定之成員的結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: The markup extension reference to provide for the member being set.
trans-unit.target: 要提供所設定之成員的標記延伸模組參考。

trans-unit.source: Service provider information passed to the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 服務提供者資訊傳遞給標記延伸。

trans-unit.source: Provides a way to invoke a callback as defined on a base class of the current acting type.
trans-unit.target: 提供所定義之目前類型的基底類別上叫用回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> reference that is relevant to this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs"></xref>.
The value of this property is the construction `value` cast to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值是建構`value`轉型為<xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>

trans-unit.source: The markup extension reference that is relevant to this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這與相關的標記擴充功能參考<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets service provider information that was passed to the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞給標記延伸的服務提供者資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the `serviceProvider` constructor argument.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值是`serviceProvider`建構函式引數。

trans-unit.source: Service provider information that was passed to the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 已傳遞給標記延伸的服務提供者資訊。
